mapper.select: SELECT SUM(A.PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.ISUSABLE='Usable' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE(), 112)

SELECT SUM(A.PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.ISUSABLE='Usable' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()-1, 112)

SELECT A.REJECT_ITEMID, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.FACTORYID ='KEM' AND B.ISUSABLE ='USABLE' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND DATEPART(MONTH,B.WORK_DATE) = #{month} GROUP BY A.REJECT_ITEMID

SELECT A.REJECT_ITEMID, A.REJECT_TYPE, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON B.DATASEQ=A.WORKDAILY_SEQ AND B.FACTORYID ='KEM' AND B.ISUSABLE ='USABLE' AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND DATEPART(MONTH,B.WORK_DATE) = DATEPART(MONTH, GETDATE()) GROUP BY A.REJECT_ITEMID, REJECT_TYPE ORDER BY A.REJECT_ITEMID ASC
